Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support because it does not provide evidence or sources to verify the image as a burning US police station.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image shows a burning US police station without providing any evidence or verification.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the image, as it is clarified that the building depicted is not a police station but an affordable housing project under construction.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is not of a police station but of a building that was part of the Minnehaha Crossing project.
Understate: The claim may understate the severity of the situation by focusing on the image without providing context about the protests and riots that occurred due to police brutality against African Americans.
Exaggerate: There is no clear evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by not providing enough context or evidence to support its assertion.
